GSD.description:
usb: gadget: f_ncm: fix potential NULL ptr deref in ncm_bitrate()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.90 by commit a69c8dfb85b44be9cc223be07d35cc3a9baefbea. For more details please see the references link.
